main event: Two boys from Emmett, Idaho claimed to have seen a flying saucer, but it was later determined to be a hoax.
interesting points: The boys initially convinced locals and authorities of their sighting,Their stories included fabricated details,They confessed to making up the incident,Investigation by Smiths Institute revealed it was a hoax,Photographs allegedly shown were faked.
witness description: two boys aged 10 to 11 years old
